```{r}
#Load Simulated Data from Similarity Network Fusion
library(SNFtool)


#Data and Labels for simulated scenario A -- from SNFtool pacakge
data("Data1")#Loads Data1
data("Data2")#Loads Data2

truelabel.1 <- c(matrix(1,100,1),matrix(2,100,1))

#Data and Labels for simulated scenario B

noise.simulation <- SimulateNoisyData(gaussian.noise = 1, gamma.noise = 2)

#Data and labels for simulated Scenario C
misclassification.simulation <- simulateMisclassificationData()
```


```{r}
#Load SNF simulated data

#Figure 1 Individual Simulated Data Scatter Views

#Scenario A - Inverted Labels
plotSimDataScatter(Data1, truelabel.1, "Simulated Data View 1")
plotSimDataScatter(Data2, truelabel.1, "Simulated Data View 2")

#Scenario B Gaussian and Gamma Noise added to ground truth

plotSimDataScatter(dat = noise.simulation$ground.truth[,c("V1", "V2")],
                   lab = noise.simulation$ground.truth[,c("label")],
                   main.title =  "Noisy Simulated Data Ground Truth")

plotSimDataScatter(dat = noise.simulation$gaussian.noise[,c("V1", "V2")],
                   lab = noise.simulation$gaussian.noise[,c("label")],
                   main.title =  "Noisy Simulated Data Gaussian Noise")

plotSimDataScatter(dat = noise.simulation$gamma.noise[,c("V1", "V2")],
                   lab = noise.simulation$gamma.noise[,c("label")],
                   main.title =  "Noisy Simulated Data Gamma Noise")

#Scenario C Misclassification on the Boundaries of Groups


```
